replies.author: xujh
replies.txt_content:
xujh 发表于 2014-9-16 20:20
你这个是客户端
客户端放这\.minecraft\mods

replies.author: ali360163
replies.txt_content: 直接放在你的服务端根文件夹下的mods文件夹

replies.author: zouchanglin
replies.txt_content: MOD是放进MODS这个文件夹里面的

replies.author: ProperSAMA
replies.txt_content: 你这是客户端，客户端哪来的plugin文件夹-.-要安装mod的话在关服状态下把mod丢进服务端根目录的mods文件夹然后启动服务器就好

replies.author: killer112211
replies.txt_content:
